attributes.action: To take in to account all the outgoings non-resident parents have to pay not just rent etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take into account that people in this day and age do have loans and heating and lighting bills - look at each case not as an over all - treat people as Individuals, we may earn a certain amount but that does not mean that we have lots of extra money just sitting around in the bank.
